recipes.title: Ginger Tea
recipes.description: A soothing tea to help with menstrual cramps
recipes.instructions:
1. Slice ginger root
2. Boil water
3. Add ginger and simmer for 5 minutes
4. Strain and add honey and lemon to taste

recipes.title: Iron-Rich Smoothie
recipes.description: A nutritious smoothie to help with iron levels during menstruation
recipes.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients to blender
2. Blend until smooth
3. Serve immediately
